hero.title: England's Largest Thatched Pub Reborn
hero.subtitle: Authentic Nepalese cooking, cask ales and community spirit opposite Waterbeach green.

promos.title: Midweek Social Wednesdays
promos.body: Gather with friends for Nepalese bar snacks and Sky Sports atmosphere.

promos.title: Order Online (Daily)
promos.body: 10% off Collection · Delivery minimum £20 · Free delivery up to 3 miles, then £2/mile. Call +44 1223 375578 or order online any day.

promos.title: Sunday Curry Evenings
promos.body: Nepalese curries and tandoor specials served 12pm–8pm every Sunday; book ahead for groups.

seo.title: The White Horse Waterbeach
seo.description: Waterbeach's thatched coaching inn serving Nepalese cuisine, British pub favourites, Sky Sports and village events.
